org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentmodel

Class EventArg

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentmodel.EventArg
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckedChangeEventArg, ClickEventArg, FocusChangeEventArg, GarbageCollectionEventArg, ItemCheckedEventArg, ItemClickEventArg, ItemLongClickEventArg, ItemSelectEventArg, LongClickEventArg, MenuItemClickEventArg, PropertyChangeEventArg

    public class EventArg
extends java.lang.Object
    Argument type of an event. Each event is uniquely identified by its argument type.
